price: Or do they have the dominion of the heavens and earth and all that is between them? Then let them ascend by any means[7].
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ
footnotes: [7] To manage the affairs of their dominion.
